SEARCH
Package fr.uge.project.parser

Class FileAnalysis

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.project.parser.FileAnalysis
public class FileAnalysis extends Object
Represents an analysis of a file, extracting information for game initialization. This class is responsible for parsing the file content and collecting data needed to initialize the game environment.

    • readParser

      public static FileAnalysis readParser(Path path) throws IOException
      Reads the content of a file and performs the parsing of the map.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the file to be read and parsed.
      Returns:
      A FileAnalysis object containing the parsed information.
      Throws:
